title: NCW Adventures logo as UI brand + favicon

requirements.summary: Add uploaded logo to frontend public assets under a stable, reusable path.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the uploaded image copied into frontend/public under a stable path (not dependent on the upload filename).
The logo can be loaded by the browser via a direct /assets/... URL without going through the backend.

file_operations.description: Copy the provided uploaded image (1771343232477.png) into a stable public asset path to serve as the canonical NCW Adventures logo.

requirements.summary: Show the NCW Adventures logo on the landing page hero and in the global in-app header on non-landing views.
acceptanceCriteria: On the landing screen, the logo is visible and does not overlap the existing hero content (title, subtitle, CTA).
On non-landing screens, the header shows the logo alongside the existing header controls without breaking layout on mobile.
All logo tags include English alt text (e.g., "NCW Adventures logo").

file_operations.description: Add the NCW Adventures logo image (served from frontend/public/assets/branding/ncw-logo.png) near the main heading in the hero layout, with responsive sizing/spacing so it stays visible without overlapping existing content, and include alt text "NCW Adventures logo".

Add the NCW Adventures logo image (served from frontend/public/assets/branding/ncw-logo.png) into the header layout so it appears on all non-landing views; ensure the flex/wrapping layout remains usable on mobile and include alt text "NCW Adventures logo".

requirements.summary: Wire the logo-derived icon assets as the app favicon/app icons via link tags in index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes favicon/app icon links pointing to the logo-derived icon files.
When the app is loaded, the browser tab/favicon displays the new NCW Adventures logo (subject to browser caching).

file_operations.description: Add/update <link rel="icon"> and related icon links to point to the generated icon assets in frontend/public/assets/generated (ncw-favicon.dim_32x32.png, ncw-app-icon.dim_192x192.png, ncw-app-icon.dim_512x512.png) so the browser uses the NCW Adventures logo for the favicon/app icon.

requirements.summary: Generate and include required logo-derived favicon/app icon variants as static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: The icon variants listed in Image Requirements are present in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified.
The generated icons are visually centered and legible at small sizes (especially 32x32).

file_operations.description: Add the generated 512x512 square app icon variant derived from the uploaded NCW logo, centered and optimized for high-resolution app icon use.
Add the generated 192x192 square app icon variant derived from the uploaded NCW logo, centered and optimized for PWA/launcher use.
Add the generated 32x32 favicon variant derived from the uploaded NCW logo, centered and made legible at small sizes.
